text: @TheRickWilson Yeah, wishful thinking. Many American Patriots have been woke. We know the Common Cold Coronavirus was just a giant scare tactic, just like these rioters all around the country. Dr. Fauci, closed indictment? Obama funding the Wuhan lab? Mainstream media needs to be defunded.
